A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too long\, too many scenes that were more suitable for a Spaceballs movie (The search for more money) than for Star Wars\, too much fan pleasing\, too many plot holes and dumb "b/c of plot" decisions\, too many ending and plotlines. Too similar to a Marvel/Pirates of the Caribbean. This is not a Star Wars movie and should never have been made.
